column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Arrived at 9:15 pm on a Sunday evening. We utilized yelp to help us satisfy our deep dish urge while visiting Chicago. We already knew what we wanted to eat
column2: so we pretty much ordered right away. The server changed right after we ordered (not sure if this is where the communication failed?) we were told it would be 35-40 mins for our 2 small deep dishes
